bs-articleinfo-desc: Provides information about a page in status bar
bs-articleinfo-newrevision-info-text-rel: There is a new version of this page available. Please [[:$1|reload]] the page to view the current content.
bs-articleinfo-pref-checkrevisioninterva: Sets the refresh rate for the "Last edit" value. This value is displayed on the page information under the quality management tools.
